original_text: ‘You people are living in beautiful houses. But my temple is still just a heap of stones! It is time for you to do something about it!
korean_text: 이 성전이 황폐하였거늘 너희가 이 때에 판벽한 집에 거주하는 것이 옳으냐

sentences.original_text: You people are living in beautiful houses.
But my temple is still just a heap of stones!
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 나의 성전은 여전히 돌 무더기일 뿐이다!

sentences.original_text: It is time for you to do something about it!
sentences.korean_translation: 이제 너희가 이 문제에 대해 무언가를 할 때가 되었다!
